channel.title: Blogs on LC-Research
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on LC-Research

item.title: Getting Rid of ._ and .DS_Store Files
item.description: You may be a Windows user who received a bunch of folders from a work colleague who is using a Mac. Or you may be frequently sharing files between a Mac and a Windows computer. Or you may be copying files from your Mac to USB sticks. Whatever the use case, you must have encountered the mystical and annoying ._ files. What exactly are these files? How do you get rid of those?

item.title: Metabolomics: A Potential Path for Early Detection of Terminal Diseases
item.description: Early detection is a misnomer. At the time of diagnosis, a solid tumor developing in the breast, colon, lung, or prostate has grown to 1 cm in size and contains 1 billion cells. The average time for this growth to reach a detectable size is 10 years. Cancer destined to spread to other vital organs has already done so.
